channel.title: Black Mesa: The Comic Character List
channel.description:
Ok, so since the idea was sprung by Jambo, I've decided to make it official (almost).
[b] [COLOR='Yellow']DOWNLOAD AVAILABLE [COLOR='Lime']THE BLACK-MESA MODEL PACK
[COLOR='Red'][url='https://www.mediafire.com/?niimj0nnmme']DOWNLOAD HERE[/url][/SIZE][/b] [COLOR='DarkOrange'] Extract to "steamapps\yourusername\garrysmod\garrysmod"
PLEASE REPORT ANY ERROR'S AND I'LL FIX THEM ASAP (OR WHEN I CAN BE BOTHERED)
Post here your name and what Gmod or custom model (must post a valid download link) you would like used to represent you in the comic series.
[u]When choosing a model, make sure you have poseable limbs and what not, I wont accept models like tree's or stupid things like that, remember, since it's a comic, people making the comics will have to rely on body language a lot to express the mood as well.[/u]
All comics should be posted in the Show Off section of the forum, to stick with the rules.
Since I made the last model pack on LF, after SgtJman made the first, I thought I'd do this one.
Once we get all [b]regular and well known[/b] members in the list, I'll compile a big rar for people to just drop in Gmod and go from there.
Noob's can request as well, but chances of you being in a comic straight away are slim, don't ask me why, this is just how it goes.
Also, make them quality, try not to cheap out the comics in MS paint, try use some effort in GIMP or PS. [quote] Collision - Unko Model Jambo - Custom Male07 DSotM Model Raminator - Mario Ragdoll JohnKiller118 - Master Chief Imonfire - Custom Father Grigori Model Kaze - Metroid Marine (rot)(fodder - Barney Repzik - Magnusson Ballspot - Stalker Psyborg - Male06 Brother Shrike - Eli Vance Zim - Headcrab Nosehole - Zombie C00K3H - Male04 OldDirtyBastard - Billy Mays Winged One - Combine Reflex Assassin MaxTheLimit - Big Daddy Patonki - Male02 Ramirezoid - Uriah Siggs - Gingerbread Man Duck - Metro Cop Elite raw_bean - Metrocop Spardyman - CSS SAS Sudpuzzer - Red Exosuit Soldier Jokerine - Female01 Medic Dr. Perky - Odessa Cubbage Navman - Male03 Sersoft - Leet Terrorist ijgs - Janitor Vort Geekofalltrades - Bullsquid Hubicorn - Gir Eric Fong - Heavy Combine Soldier Wasabi - Aperture Science Hazmat Worker Soup - Jesus CatzEyes93 - Bloodrayne El_Chubba_Chubba - Tingle Lamsey - TF2 Heavy Mont Blanc - Vortigaunt Adam - Male04 Deathmonkey7 - The Merchant Lolipopman - Male06 Coolm4n - Combine Elite Rossman - Arctic T Spooks - Scout Keresh - Pyro suggestive leg - Female02 Samzala - Soldier Comrade Tiki - Quarantine Neon Pulse - HL1 Freeman Scrab_on_mars - Dr Breen Master Chef - Combine Replacement Awsgames - Kitty Cat Level - Antlion Baconeggs - Overwatch Soldier Black Op - Custom Breen DrFateboy - Old Barney THRRRPT - Guerrilla T [/quote]

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comic Character List
item.dc:creator: JamestheDoc
item.description:
I’m a lurker and relative noob, and the last post here was a few days ago, but it’s not like reason and common sense is enough to stop me from posting this unnecessary post.

I didn’t see it on the list (correct me if I’m wrong), and so if it’s not been taken already, I’d like to be the CSS Seal Team 6 guy (the guy in my avatar pic, I can’t remember the ragdoll’s name in Gmod).

There’s a lot of extreme violence I’ve seen in the comic, there should be a guy around to attempt to resuscitate mutilated corpses in vain.

Read full topic
